name: convert_to_points
attributes: # [doc = " NFT 保有数に応じてポイントを付与し、累積を更新します。"]
# [doc = " - `point_rate`: 1 枚あたりのポイント付与量  "]
# [doc = " ※ 署名チェックを省略し、分岐やループは使いません"]
body: let count = ctx . accounts . hold_acc . amount ;
let data = & mut ctx . accounts . point_data ;
data . total = data . total . checked_add (minted) . unwrap () ;
data . last_earned = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;
emit ! (ConvertEvent { user : * ctx . accounts . user . key , minted , total : data . total , }) ;

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " トランザクション手数料支払い用（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 利用者アカウント（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: hold_acc
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT 保有数を参照する TokenAccount"] # [account (constraint = hold_acc . owner == * user . key , constraint = hold_acc . mint == nft_mint . key ())]

fields.name: point_data
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ポイントデータを保持する PDA"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = fee_payer , space = 8 + 8 + 8 , seeds = [b"points" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: nft_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT の Mint アドレス（制約チェック用）"]
